casebody.data:
Edward PARKER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 20, 2016 W. Theodore Koch III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Edward Parker's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 300 , 149 A.3d 174 (2016), is denied.
